ComicInfo.Summary:
Frank Frazetta's legendary creation Death Dealer returns to life in collaboration with Frazetta Girls! Mitch Iverson, Stefano Martino, and Luis Antonio Delgado continue the first salvo in a major launch of new, related titles featuring characters envisioned by the Master himself! Bear witness to the beginning of an entire multiverse of Frazetta's most famous creations!
Kur and the Death Dealer travel the land to get to the Sorceress's stronghold. There Kur askes for her help to find Mesh and Admira. The Sorceress offers to help but he aid is cut short when Pestilence uses his magic to change the Sorceress's stronghold into a monster.
Kur is forced to release the Death Dealer to destroy the monster, but not before all the Sorceress's people are killed and she is forced to put down the now enraged Death Dealer before he hurts anyone else.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/frank-frazettas-death-dealer-2/4000-951598/
